The fastest _____ of the group is always surrounded by Dreepy that want to fly at sonic speed.
_____ can make its whole body transparent by clearing its mind and focusing. Even the Dreepy in _____’s horns become invisible.
Apparently the Dreepy inside _____’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.
